thread.section_title: Hotel Edouard 7 - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Experience
thread.title_full: Excellent Experience - Review of Hotel Edouard 7, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Andrew D
title: Excellent Experience
text:
Visited Paris for a long weekend to support the Scottish Rugby Team
This hotel was both friendly and professional
We were upgraded to a Delux room with a balcony and Opera House view
The staff were very helpful particularly Billy and Marie Camille at reception
The hotel was a nice size where staff had time to deal with all our requests and went an extra mile to ensure our stay went without a hitch
Location very central
Loved the sweets and perfume at bed time
Would return
Room Tip: Room 502 was spacious and had a balcony See more room tips
